statements.select:
SELECT COUNT(SasT_ID) FROM SD_SalesTemplate
SasT_ID != #WHERE_SasT_ID#
SasT_Name = #WHERE_SasT_Name#
SasT_Org_ID = #WHERE_SasT_Org_ID#

DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.SasT_ID) FROM SD_SalesTemplate T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T21.SasTD_SasT_ID , T21.SasTD_AutoFactoryOrgID 'AROrgID' FROM SD_SalesTemplateDetail T21 WHERE T21.SasTD_IsValid = 1 ) T2 ON T2.SasTD_SasT_ID = T1.SasT_ID WHERE 1 = 1
T1.SasT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_Name#+'%'
T1.SasT_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.SasT_AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
T1.SasT_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_ApprovalStatusName#+'%'
T1.SasT_IsValid=#WHERE_SasT_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.SasT_ID , T1.SasT_Name , T1.SasT_Org_ID , T1.SasT_AutoFactoryCode , T1.SasT_AutoFactoryName , T1.SasT_CustomerID , T1.SasT_CustomerName , T1.SasT_AutoFactoryOrgCode , T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusCode , T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusName , T1.SasT_Remark , T1.SasT_IsValid , T1.SasT_CreatedBy , T1.SasT_CreatedTime , T1.SasT_UpdatedBy , T1.SasT_UpdatedTime , T1.SasT_VersionNo , T2.AROrgID , ISNULL(T1.SasT_CustomerID, '') + ';' + ISNULL(T2.AROrgID, '') + ';' + ISNULL(T1.SasT_AutoFactoryOrgCode, '') 'AutoFactoryOrgInfo' FROM SD_SalesTemplate T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T21.SasTD_SasT_ID , T21.SasTD_AutoFactoryOrgID 'AROrgID' FROM SD_SalesTemplateDetail T21 WHERE T21.SasTD_IsValid = 1 ) T2 ON T2.SasTD_SasT_ID = T1.SasT_ID WHERE 1 = 1
T1.SasT_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_Name#+'%'
T1.SasT_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.SasT_AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
T1.SasT_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_CustomerName#+'%'
T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SasT_ApprovalStatusName#+'%'
T1.SasT_IsValid=#WHERE_SasT_IsValid#
ORDER BY T1.SasT_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

SELECT T1.SasT_ID , T1.SasT_Name , T1.SasT_Org_ID , T1.SasT_AutoFactoryCode , T1.SasT_AutoFactoryName , T1.SasT_CustomerID , T1.SasT_CustomerName , T1.SasT_AutoFactoryOrgCode , T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusCode , T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusName , T1.SasT_Remark , T1.SasT_IsValid , T1.SasT_CreatedBy , T1.SasT_CreatedTime , T1.SasT_UpdatedBy , T1.SasT_UpdatedTime , T1.SasT_VersionNo , T1.SasT_TransID FROM SD_SalesTemplate T1 INNER JOIN SD_DistributePath T2 ON T2.DP_Org_ID_To = T1.SasT_Org_ID AND T2.DP_IsValid = 1 AND T2.DP_SendDataID = #WHERE_DP_SendDataID# AND T2.DP_Org_ID_From = #WHERE_DP_Org_ID_From# AND T2.DP_Org_ID_To = #WHERE_DP_Org_ID_To# WHERE T1.SasT_IsValid = 1 AND T1.SasT_Name = #WHERE_SasT_Name#

SELECT COUNT(T1.SasT_ID) FROM SD_SalesTemplate T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T21.SasTD_SasT_ID , T21.SasTD_AutoFactoryOrgID , T21.SasTD_AutoFactoryOrgName FROM SD_SalesTemplateDetail T21 WHERE T21.SasTD_IsValid = 1
T21.SasTD_AutoFactoryOrgID =#WHERE_AROrgID# ) T2 ON T2.SasTD_SasT_ID = T1.SasT_ID WHERE T1.SasT_IsValid = 1 AND T1.SasT_Org_ID = #WHERE_SasT_Org_ID# AND T1.SasT_CustomerID = #WHERE_SasT_CustomerID# AND T1.SasT_ApprovalStatusName = #WHERE_SasT_ApprovalStatusName#
